original_text: This is what I pray for you. I pray that you will continue to love each other more and more. I pray that you will know God better and better. I pray that you will understand all those things that are true.
korean_text: 내가 기도하노라 너희 사랑을 지식과 모든 총명으로 점점 더 풍성하게 하사

sentences.original_text: This is what I pray for you.
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 내가 너희를 위해 기도하는 것이다.

sentences.original_text: I pray that you will continue to love each other
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희가 서로 계속 사랑하기를 기도한다.

sentences.original_text: I pray that you will know God
I pray that you will understand
all those things that are true.
